H0.text: Calabrese is a variety of which vegetable of the cabbage family. Cauliflower

H1.text: Calabrese is a variety of which vegetable of the cabbage family. Kale

H2.text: Calabrese is a variety of which vegetable of the cabbage family. Cabbage

H3.text: Calabrese is a variety of which vegetable of the cabbage family. Brocoli

A4.text: Broccoli (Brassica oleracea var. italica) is an edible green plant in the cabbage family (family Brassicaceae, genus Brassica) whose large flowering head, stalk and small associated leaves are eaten as a vegetable.

A5.text: Broccoli resembles cauliflower, a different but closely related cultivar group of the same Brassica species.
